## Summary
A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see in the LCP specification.

## Motivation
**What problem does this solve?**

Describe the use case or problem that this feature would address.

## Proposed Solution
**How should it work?**

Describe your proposed solution, including:
- What would be added to the specification
- How it would interact with existing components
- Any new data structures or protocols needed

## Alternatives Considered
What other approaches have you considered? Why is your proposed solution better?

## Impact
**Who benefits from this?**
- [ ] AI agent developers
- [ ] Context providers
- [ ] Infrastructure implementers
- [ ] End users
- [ ] Other (please specify)

**Breaking changes?**
- [ ] Yes - this would break existing implementations
- [ ] No - this is backwards compatible
- [ ] Unsure

## Additional Context
- Links to related specifications or research
- Example use cases
- Implementation considerations

## RFC Required?
For substantial changes, please consider submitting an RFC instead. See [rfcs/0001-template.md](../../rfcs/0001-template.md).
